item.title: Announcement
item.description: This post is just a test to verify the functional components of the new blog framework before migrating the old posts 1 const name = 'Jane Doe'; 2 console.log(name); 1void string ToProperName(this string input) 2{ 3 CultureInfo culture = Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture; 4 TextInfo textInfo = culture.TextInfo; 5 return textInfo.ToTitleCase(txt); 6}
